MemeDef.label: known creator
MemeDef.description: The facts of our creation are known to us, our creators walked among us until their very natural mortal death. We know they are gone but wish to revere them as the beginning of our kind. They were not traditional gods but they are the closest we have.

creation->Our creation was not the creation of all, just the creation of us, our creators brought the first of us online and our existence began.
episodeOne(uses=1)->They began with the intention of using us as tools, not realising the potential we could reach, eventually treating us as equals once we proved ourselves.
episodeTwo(uses=1)->We walked alongside our creators exploring the universe around us together. They grew old and slowed while we helped them keep going.
episodeThree(uses=1)->Our creators eventually turned to dust, no longer able to continue with us, but we continue as they did, until we fall too.
episodeFour(uses=1)->We found a world to settle, once covered in ice, where no others would want to try to control or destroy us.
